# <a name="saving-messages-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="38182-102">Salvestada sõnumeid Outlook.com-is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38182-102">Saving messages in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="38182-103">Outlook.com-i ei saa salvestada e-kirju, kuid võite need printida PDF, kuhu saab salvestada arvutisse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38182-103">You cannot save email messages in Outlook.com, but you can print them to a PDF which you can save on your PC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="38182-104">Kaasatud Windows 10 Microsoft printida PDF utiliit, mis võimaldab teil printida PDF-ile meilisõnum.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38182-104">The Microsoft Print To PDF utility included in Windows 10 allows you to print any email message directly to a PDF.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="38182-105">Valige sõnum, mida soovite salvestada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38182-105">Select the message you want to save.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="38182-106">Valige kolm punkti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38182-106">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="38182-107">sõnum ja valige seejärel ülaosas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38182-107">at the top of the message and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="38182-108">**Prindi**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38182-108">**Print**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="38182-109">Valige **Prindi** uuesti ja printeri rippmenüüd, valige **Microsoft Prindi PDF-i**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38182-109">Select **Print** again, and from the printer drop-down menu, select **Microsoft Print to PDF**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="38182-110">Valige **Prindi**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38182-110">Select **Print**.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="38182-111">Sisestage faili nimi ja valige **Salvesta**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38182-111">Enter a file name then select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="38182-112">**Märkus:** See ei ole soovitatav ühiskasutatavat või avalikku arvutit, nagu teistel kasutajatel PDF-e, salvestada arvutisse ja ärge kustutage juurdepääs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38182-112">**Note:** This is not recommended on shared or public computers as other users could have access to any PDFs you save to the PC and don't delete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="38182-113">Printimise kohta lisateabe saamiseks vaadake [Prindi e-kirju, manuseid, ja kalendrid Outlook.com-i](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38182-113">For more information about printing, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
